title: Elixir Quest â€” a Unity adventure game
summary: A simple adventure game built in Unity. Downloadable as a ZIP.
content: Elixir Quest is a small adventure game I built in Unity. This page provides a direct download of the game as a ZIP archive. Unzip, then run the executable file within the folder to run the game.

title: Android Shopping List App
summary: A very simple Android app for managing shopping lists. Android Studio ZIP file.
content: This was a simple android app I built as part of a university project that enables a user to create and manage shopping lists. Users can let a cover image, type in tghe item they need, select a quanity and choose a unit of measuremnet
